entry.title: Docusaurus Setup
entry.summary: I am creating this personal site to test out Docusaurus v2
entry.content:
I am creating this personal site to test out Docusaurus v2 and potentially serve as a place for me showcase some of the personal projects I am working on.

So far I have simply followed the tutorial to scaffold this website, cleaned it up and added some personal info, and updated the theme a bit.

Next step is to test out deployment with Github Pages followed by updating to add more content and project examples.
